data.text: It's very sunny Friday here in Riga which means #airBalticQuiz is back! ☀️ We will go into more technical aspects of aviation this time - can you guess the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft? 📏

Feeling full of life when nature is at its peak!☀️ Latvians believe that flower crown collects unique power from wild herbs and blossoms giving energy to its wearer. May your flower crown be abundant and Midsummer’s Eve full of light! https://t.co/3nCJP6WkTe

data.text: Izjust saulgriežu enerģiju, kad daba ir tās plaukumā!☀️ Paražas vēsta, ka vainagā iepītās zāles un ziedi dod īpašu spēku tā nēsātājam visu atlikušo gadu. Novēlām košus un gaismas pilnus svētkus! https://t.co/tAbZH9Qv2Z
When the longest day meets the shortest night – that’s when Midsummer magic happens! @airBaltic wishes you magnetic solstice time! https://t.co/c7uxJ82fzU

The results are in! ✔️ More than a half of you were correct this time - during the first four weeks of resumed operations, airBaltic has carried over 27 000 passengers to and from the Baltic capitals!

We wish you a sunny week! ☀️ https://t.co/UQKw2sKH7i

We are happy to be one of the first airlines to join @EASA charter for the return to normal operations under COVID-19, pledging to work with their national authorities to put measures in place to support health safety. Read more: https://t.co/bgsNdSh58L https://t.co/02sKk5DyvG

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Another Friday with #airBalticQuiz has landed! ☀️
This time we are wondering if you know how many passengers we've carried during the first four weeks since restart of our operations? ✈️

We are happy to see passenger interest growing rapidly and we are ready to welcome all travellers on board! Last week the number of new reservations made for airBaltic flights to and from the Baltic capitals has grown 54%. Read more: https://t.co/r43q5aLHsE https://t.co/EpFU60fjzX

Proud to operate the youngest fleet in the world! After introducing the “Destination 2025 CLEAN” business plan, @airBaltic has become the first carrier of @Airbus A220-300 single type fleet with the average age of aircraft being only 1.9 years. https://t.co/vt5G2GFfeG

Sunny greetings from @DublinAirport! 🍀 It was our pleasure to kick-off Vilnius – Dublin route opening by flying @Airbus YL-CSK aircraft carrying the colours of the Lithuanian flag. Looking forward meeting you on board! https://t.co/j4bMfD93Yv

data.text: During the first four weeks of resumed operations, we have carried over 27 000 passengers to and from the Baltic capitals. Read more: https://t.co/raDNtAp4Af https://t.co/qbO6X6RY2R

Thank you for participating in this week’s #airBalticQuiz! ✔️ More than a half (56%) got the right answer - by the end of the summer our flight network will cover 49 destinations. See them all here: https://t.co/bQbG0AdMdo https://t.co/r0rqHQ7SxG

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text:
👋 It's Friday again and that means #airBalticQuiz! 
We are continuing to add more destinations to our network day by day! Can you guess how many destinations we are currently planning to serve by the end of the summer? 🤔

Šorīt ar atjaunoto @airBaltic Rīga-Parīze reisu nogādājām īpašu sveicienu Latvijas pirmajai vēstniecei Francijā @LVenFrance Ainai Nagobads-Ābols kundzei viņas nozīmīgajā 100 gadu jubilejā. Vislabākie vēlējumi dzimšanas dienā! https://t.co/A4pfcJRdxv
Great news for passengers traveling from Estonia! @airBaltic announces plans to resume direct flights from Tallinn to Malaga on July 6. Read more: https://t.co/XEqvPopExq https://t.co/TDombvevOE

New flights from Vilnius! @airBaltic announces plans to launch direct flights from Vilnius to London on June 15, Dublin on June 16 and Dubrovnik on July 6. Read more: https://t.co/45WeTbYamA https://t.co/SwWVhsV7Lw

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights from Riga to nine popular summer leisure destinations between June 15 and July 7. Read more: https://t.co/TDStPNWLBd https://t.co/R19pgQiNmY

Pēc visu nepieciešamo atļauju saņemšanas @airBaltic laika periodā no 15. jūnija līdz 7. jūlijam plāno atsākt tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas uz deviņiem iecienītiem vasaras atpūtu galamērķiem. Lasi vairāk: https://t.co/ioLFlgvrbb https://t.co/GtGukw2462

Pēc visu nepieciešamo atļauju saņemšanas @airBaltic plāno 8. jūnijā atsākt tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas uz Kopenhāgenu. Lidojumu sarakstu var apskatīt šeit: https://t.co/Xqj0sNpDq9 https://t.co/Shh1d8DGPl
After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights from Riga to Copenhagen on June 8. Read more: https://t.co/Txxe97sLtY https://t.co/1Wph5GWQTt

Labas ziņas liepājniekiem un Liepājas viesiem! @airBaltic pakāpeniski atsāk lidojumus, atjaunojot reisus uz tiem galamērķiem, kur lidojumi ir atļauti. Iekšzemes lidojumus no Rīgas uz Liepāju pašlaik plānojam atsākt 13. jūlijā. Lasi vairāk: https://t.co/AE5dlzyNMK https://t.co/GvbQO4baLs
After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights from Vilnius to Paris on June 9. Read more: https://t.co/2m5xOF0M9C https://t.co/BxlniKCsYu

Lai ierobežotu iespējamo vīrusa izplatības risku, aicinām būt līdzatbildīgiem un izmantot mobilo lietotni @apturicovid! 
📱Lejupielādē to šeit: 
👉iOS: https://t.co/GP8dw42hsj
👉Android: https://t.co/haU7m8XvfJ https://t.co/sw43HPK9iU

data.text: Experience the smooth landing of our @Airbus A220-300 at @Oslolufthavn. This was our first flight on the new route from Vilnius to Oslo! We perform these direct flights twice a week - check them now! ✈️ https://t.co/xuEW22cXRQ https://t.co/jlg81GNDae

data.text: After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights from Riga to Paris on June 9, two days earlier than planned before. Read more: https://t.co/ILJbfFnvur https://t.co/5eARPWeubm

Pēc visu nepieciešamo atļauju saņemšanas @airBaltic plāno 9. jūnijā atsākt tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas uz Parīzi, kas ir divas dienas ātrāk nekā sākotnēji plānots. Vairāk informācijas: https://t.co/oKzfg7mqtz https://t.co/Kf2MQrYKz3

This week quiz has concluded! ✔️ 17% of you got the right answer this time - the first scheduled flight after resuming regular scheduled operations on May 18 was from Tallinn to Amsterdam! 
Have a nice Sunday everyone! 👋

📸 by Jonas Härtel https://t.co/uV4gb3w7hR

Hello from Oslo! 👋 The launch of the new Vilnius-Oslo route was very special - we performed it with @airBaltic aircraft carrying the colours of the Lithuanian flag. New beginnings are always very exciting, and we're looking forward to meet many happy passengers on this route! https://t.co/jbJRvFTFO6

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic plans to resume direct flights from Vilnius to Amsterdam on June 8 and to Berlin on June 11, 2020. Read more: https://t.co/8BoMF8qh0A https://t.co/14UyXEQdtd

Jūlijā @airBaltic pasažieriem piedāvās jaunus biļešu veidus - izvēli starp Green, Green Plus, Green Classic vai Biznesa klases biļetēm, kas labāk pielāgotas katra ceļotāja vajadzībām. Lasi vairāk par jaunajiem biļešu veidiem: https://t.co/SoMSEIUVUZ https://t.co/rcOvS148X0

In July @airBaltic will introduce revised ticket types for its flights. Passengers will be able to select Green, Green Plus, Green Classic or Business class tickets tailored to better suit each traveller’s needs. Read more about the new ticket types: https://t.co/fCySeBx2o6 https://t.co/kGNZKOFx5x
#airBalticQuiz is back! Do you know on which route @airBaltic performed its first flight after resuming regular scheduled operations on May 18?
How good it feels to be back home in the skies! 📸 by Dana Vitkovska https://t.co/kbdZ927SuA

We have updated our route map with all @airBaltic resumed flights till June 9th!✈️Reopening of flights from Riga, Tallinn and Vilnius will follow soon. For newly purchased tickets until June 30, you can change your flight date once without a fee: https://t.co/qOa3btPtNF https://t.co/CH7QIDWNlj

Growing strong! Compared to the first full week of May, last week the number of new bookings increased by nearly 500%. In total, last week passengers made more than 13 000 new reservations for their future travel. Read more: https://t.co/I9RmTVJVjP https://t.co/gFzSfGqxnA

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, we are glad to announce our plan to launch new direct @airBaltic flights from Vilnius to Oslo on May 28, 2020. Read more: https://t.co/2smKSG0g5s https://t.co/Nzi7XzFXRV

Ar @Sat_Min speciālo atļauju @airBaltic 25. maijā atsāks tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas uz Amsterdamu, savukārt no 1. jūnija –  Hamburgu, 8. jūnija – Vīni un no 9. jūnija – Diseldorfu. Vairāk: https://t.co/b9LH3Xvgmb https://t.co/OqC4ge6MrH

After receiving a special permission from the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Latvia, @airBaltic will resume direct flights from Riga to Amsterdam on May 25, Hamburg on June 1, Vienna on June 8 and Dusseldorf on June 9. Read more: https://t.co/i6o0jdRoVb https://t.co/UHtbwect6B

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic will resume direct flights from Tallinn to Paris on June 1, Vienna on June 2 and Berlin on June 4. Read more: https://t.co/YEUvOuSWrW https://t.co/YVUKbqDX4g

Rūpējamies par jūsu drošu ceļošanu! 💚 Mūsu pasažieru drošība ir @airBaltic galvenā prioritāte, tāpēc esam ieviesuši jaunas veselības aizsardzības procedūras mūsu lidojumos un lidostās. Uzzini vairāk: https://t.co/AzUQ6bad4G https://t.co/qp25dMvdTt

We care! 💚 The whole @airBaltic family is working day and night as one to provide safe travels, because your health and well-being is our top priority. Watch the video and read more about our new health measures: https://t.co/Ti897Doa04 https://t.co/Q8LNe2v9xn

After a special permission from the Latvian Ministry of Transport, @airBaltic will resume direct flights from Riga to Helsinki and Munich on May 25 and from Riga to Berlin on June 1, 2020. Read more: https://t.co/ApVXxo9GW2 https://t.co/FSg5vhQ3tA

Ar @Sat_Min īpašo atļauju @airBaltic 25. maijā atsāks tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas uz Helsinkiem un Minheni, savukārt no 1. jūnija lidojumus no Rīgas uz Berlīni. Vairāk: https://t.co/cqyTzRRXaj https://t.co/RMq0mkqLAd

We are back in the sky! ✈️ Get familiar with our new updated routemap gradually offering flights to more than 50 destinations from Riga as well as Tallinn and Vilnius! 🌍
Explore more: https://t.co/T7GmNYnlI7 https://t.co/BH4EUPaLye

Šodien @riga_airport kopā ar @Sat_Min preses konferencē informējām sabiedrību un medijus par jaunajiem veselības drošības pasākumiem un @airbaltic atsāktajiem regulārajiem lidojumiem. Foto: @riga_airport https://t.co/kQtIb5qgn5

A long-awaited moment is finally here! 😍 As of today we resume our regular flights. Look up in the skies - you'll see our green tails there much more often! 📸 by Kristīne Limare https://t.co/XGI1Y5I1nY

We care for your well-being! From now on @airBaltic fleet will consist only of the Airbus A220-300 aircraft, which will provide environmentally friendly flights, unsurpassed comfort and modern air filtration systems for benefit of our passengers! https://t.co/bD4G5DksUh

Mūsu pasažieru, darbinieku un sabiedrības drošība un veselība ir galvenā prioritāte. Turpinām rūpīgi strādāt, lai nodrošinātu, ka varat ceļot droši, elastīgi un ar pārliecību. Aicinām iepazīties ar jaunajiem veselības drošības pasākumiem. Uzzini vairāk: https://t.co/kfoyJl4goY https://t.co/PR4OyiMQPQ

The health and well-being of our passengers, employees and society stand above all. We continue to work hard to ensure you can travel safely, flexibly, and with confidence. Follow the new health measures to protect yourself and fellow travelers. Read more: https://t.co/oAUbmuEFRC https://t.co/WxbqrT33TG
